text: Paul John Tagliabue (; born November 24, 1940) is the former Commissioner of the National Football League. He became commissioner in 1989 and retired in 2006. He was replaced by Roger Goodell, who was elected to the position on August 8, 2006. Tagliabue had previously served as a lawyer for the NFL. Tagliabue served as Chairman of Board of Directors of Georgetown University from 2008 to 2015. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Businesspeople from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:National Football League commissioners
title: Paul Tagliabue
